wiki.name: Practicing Feedback Math
wiki.intro:
You have received the completed assignment below from one of your students.  What feedback would you give this student?  What comments would you provide that will increase learning for this student? Click on the Edit tab to add your ideas. Be sure to include your name in parentheses after your addition.

 

Student Assignment

Compose a short narrative using vocabulary that describes change and sketch a line graph based on the narrative.

 

Students should demonstrate the following:

  • Understanding of the x and y axis
  • Understanding of scale
  • Understanding of how the shape of a line provides information about what is happening over time.
